description: This file defines API routes for managing products in a FastAPI application, including creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting products. It uses SQLAlchemy for database interactions and FastAPI's routing and dependency injection features.

methods.name: create_product
methods.description: Creates a new product in the database and returns the created product.

methods.name: list_products
methods.description: Returns a list of all products.

methods.name: get_product
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its ID.

methods.name: update_product
methods.description: Updates an existing product by its ID with provided data.

methods.name: delete_product
methods.description: Deletes a product by its ID.
